name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Python Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Python** and **Django**. Proven expertise in building robust APIs and automating processes to enhance system efficiency. Proficient in **AWS** for deploying cloud-native systems and implementing CI/CD pipelines to streamline development workflows. Strong focus on observability to ensure optimal performance of applications in production.
Skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, with hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development using frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. Experienced in creating AI/ML-powered platforms that incorporate predictive analytics and real-time processing, leveraging tools in the MLOps ecosystem like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

experience.responsibilities:

• Implemented CI/CD pipelines leveraging **AWS** services and tools like **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI** to streamline deployment processes and enhance software observability.
• Automated testing and deployment processes using a combination of **pytest**, **Jest**, and modern CI tools, achieving **95% test coverage** and reduced deployment times by **30%**.
• Optimized backend services for scalability and reliability, integrating automation workflows that improved performance monitoring and observability metrics.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams utilizing **AWS** and intelligent automation tools to deliver innovative features, enhancing user experience in both financial and health applications.
• Drove key performance indicators (KPIs) tracking through advanced observability strategies, leading to a **20%** increase in application responsiveness.
• Mentored junior developers in best practices for API development and automation, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
• Enhanced system reliability and error tracking through implementation of observability frameworks, reducing incident response time by **40%**.

Utilized **Python** and **Django** to develop scalable backend services, enhancing system performance by **30%** through code optimization and best practices.

Employed observability tools to monitor application performance in real-time, proactively addressing potential issues and improving system uptime by **99.9%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver high-quality software solutions that align with business objectives.

Engaged in code reviews and automated testing to assure code quality and maintainability, leading to a **15%** reduction in bug reports from production.
